page.title: 12RECREATION AND RELIGION
page.content: There are a number of parks in our area including{Bruntwood,Ryecroft, {and Maple.}Ryecroft Park is a private park.Maple Avenue Park has only three apparatus,while Bruntwood Park has a new BMX course and a lot of open fields.In my opinion Maple Avenue is in need of repair whereas Bruntwood is amply equipped already.We did not visit Ryecroft but we were able to see that it was quite prosperous,with a meeting house and floodlights. We are well served with churches in our area.We were able to visit St. Andrew's church.This church was built in 1959 on the site of the old wooden church.The church was built to the cost of Â£25 000,not including fittings.It is a busy church with mother and toddler and youth groups. There are also two choirs,the main choir and the youth choir.
